EmailTemplate.description: Email for Homeowner - For lease accounts with more than 30days lease payment past due
EmailTemplate.name: 2.a - Lessee's account past due notification for Homeowner
EmailTemplate.subject: Case# {!Case.CaseNumber}: Refinance request ON HOLD - Lease# {!Case.Lease__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
IMPORTANT: Do not reply on this email. Please read below carefully.
Refinance Request Case {!Case.CaseNumber} Lease#: {!Case.Lease__c}
Hi {!Account.Name},
We were notified by your escrow/lender that you are currently refinancing your home. However, it shows in our record that you have a monthly lease payment still due. We would be happy to resume this request soon as the account is cleared.
For over the phone payments, please call 1-800-321-1770, Option 2.
Note the case for this request will be discontinued. Kindly notify us soon as you have made your payment so we may create a new case for you.
Should you have further concerns or queries, kindly send a NEW email with the lease# or property address on the subject line.
IMPORTANT: Do not reply on this email.
Thank you! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Refinance Team | Life Events SunPower | PO Box 845759, Los Angeles, CA 90084-5759 | Office 1-800-321-1770 | Fax 1-512-857-1155 | refinance@sunpower.com
